card: Donâ€™t use any transport today (only walk)
missiont: Walking increases your cardiovascular fitness, strengthens muscles, and improves mood. Science shows that just 30 minutes of walking daily can reduce the risk of heart disease.
challenget: Walking increases your cardiovascular fitness, strengthens muscles, and improves mood. Science shows that just 30 minutes of walking daily can reduce the risk of heart disease.
lifet: Walking increases your cardiovascular fitness, strengthens muscles, and improves mood. Science shows that just 30 minutes of walking daily can reduce the risk of heart disease.

card: Plant a Tree or a Plant
missiont: Gardening is a great moderate exercise that improves strength, flexibility, and mood. Science shows it reduces stress and boosts immune function.
challenget: Trees absorb carbon dioxide and release oxygen, combating climate change, improving air quality, and supporting biodiversity.
lifet: Planting fosters a sense of accomplishment and connection to nature. Research indicates it enhances mental well-being and life satisfaction.

missiont: A tidy space reduces anxiety, improves focus, and enhances mental well-being. Plus, decluttering encourages physical activity, boosting cardiovascular health.
challenget: Donating items helps reduce waste and the demand for new products. Reusing and recycling conserve resources and decrease landfill waste.
lifet: Donating fosters community and purpose, enhancing personal happiness and social connections. A clutter-free space also boosts productivity and creativity.
